divs: sighting detailsi was traveling home from work on highway 101 in san mateo county (heading south), when i noticed in the sky to the southeast a very strange stationary amber glowing star-like object\light. it looked like and glowed like a star, but it was more yellow\amber than a star and much bigger and closer to earth than a star (but it was definitely miles away). i was pretty dumbfounded and watched this thing for about 10 to 15 seconds (it hovered stationary for that entire time). as i was watching it, it just, "poof" (suddenly) disappeared. very strange. definitely not a commercial airplane. i know i can't be the only one who saw it!!
Summary: viewed from Highway 101 in San Mateo County amber star like (but much bigger and closer to earth) stationary object for about 15 seconds which suddenly disappeared. Not a plane.
